title: Kannadi Silaiye Lyrics Iruvar Ullam
stanzas:
ye kannadi silaiye
kannadi silaiye
munnaadi nindraai
mugam paarthen

minsaara mazhaiye
minsaara mazhaiye
enakkulle peindhaai
naan saaindhaen.

unpaarvai pattadhum
thandhai thaai marandhen.
ennnai ne thottdhum
enna naan izhanthaen.

kannadi silaiye
kannadi silaiye
munnaadi nindraai
mugam paarthen

minsaara mazhaiye
minsaara mazhaiye
enakkulle peindhaai
naan saaindhaen.

neru varai nee endhan
idhayathin orathil
eppadi vandhaai ennarugil
thodukindra thoorathil

alangaaram seivathillai
vaanathu vennilavu
adhai pole boomiyile
nee enthan perazhagu

idhu kanavil ninjamaa
illai nijathil kanavaaa
idhu valiyil sugamaa
enakku puriyavillai.

kannadi silaiye
kannadi silaiye
munnaadi nindraai
mugam paarthen

minsaara mazhaiye
minsaara mazhaiye
enakkulle peindhaai
naan saaindhaen.

kadavulai naan kandathillai
unmugam paarthuvitten
un mandhira kangalai
paarthathume mayakkathil
vizhunthuvitten.

unnai mattum ulagathile
nodikoru murai ninaippen
ennuyiril unnuyirai thinam
ini naan sumappen.

idhu kanavil ninjamaa
illai nijathil kanavaaa
idhu valiyil sugamaa
enakku puriyavillai.Â
